actions.name: Docker Images For Repo Handling
actions.description: Builds and pushes Docker images for various Armbian distributions and architectures to GitHub Container Registry. Generates a build matrix from supported distributions, creates Dockerfiles, and executes the build process using Docker Buildx. Summarizes the built images in a report after the build process completes.
actions.cron_schedule: at 30 minutes past the hour, at 3:00

actions.name: Docker Images for Framework
actions.description: Updates Docker images used for building CI by generating Dockerfiles and building multi-architecture images for various OS releases. It builds and pushes images to the GitHub Container Registry, and creates multi-arch manifests to consolidate them. The process includes retries for failed builds and utilizes QEMU and Docker Buildx for cross-platform support.
actions.cron_schedule: at 0 minutes past the hour, at 3:00
